Title: A million bold warriors cross the Yangzi River
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: On the night of 20 April 1949, a million heroes crossed the Yangzi River in three places along a front of a thousand li (500 km.). On the 23rd, they occupied Nanjing and ended the Guomindang’s rule. Chongming Island, near Shanghai, was liberated on 2 June, ending the battle of crossing the river successfully.
